title: MASTERTOP Heavy Duty Industrial Mop, 90cm Wide Large Commercial Flat Mop with 155cm Telescopic Handle, Dust Sweeper Mops with 3 Reusable Pads, Professional Floor Mops for Warehouse, Office, Hotel
features: Large Floor Cleaning Mop: The flat mop head features a practical L: 90cm x W: 13cm design, perfect for industrial or commercial use, whether it's in warehouses, factories, supermarkets, schools or wide areas such as hotels, offices, shopping centres and more. Compared with normal industrial mops it can clean a larger area of the floor and increase cleaning efficiency

Lightweight Commercial Mop: Better than other mops made of metal or plastic, the professional mop is made of lightweight and user-friendly aluminium alloy mop head, 800g weight greatly reduces the weight and burden of labour and avoids the stress and pain of long-time working on the waist, back and wrists. And Premium aluminium alloy is not easy to break and deform, can be used for a long time

Super-absorbent and Wear-resistant Mop Pads: the commercial mop comes with 3 pieces of mop pads in the package, 1 x cotton mop head, 2 x microfibre mop head, a variety of mop pads to meet more needs, can be used in both wet and dry, whether it's to absorb the water on the floor or stubborn stains and messy hairs can be cleaned easily and without leaving traces. Both mop pads can be used individually or wet with cotton pads and then quickly dried with the microfibre pads. The thicker and larger design is reusable for use on vinyl floors, hardwood, tile, marble, concrete, stone, etc.

360° Flexible Industrial Mop Head: For better use, the heavy duty mop head features a 360° rotatable design, which makes it easy to clean the edge corners, such as under the bed, under the table, cupboards, crevices, and all the dead corners of the area. The lightweight yet flexible wider mop saves more time and effort and is smoother to use

Adjustable Handle Length from 131cm to 155cm: The floor dust sweeper mop handle has an adjustable length knob, you can adjust the handle length from 131cm to 155cm according to your height needs, the fixed knob is not easy to slip off and loose. The longer handle length can avoid you to bend down frequently when you use it, reduce the pressure on the lower back and avoid back pain. Each joint of the handle adopts embedded structure, and the reinforced joints are not easy to deform and bend

Easy to Install: The premium cotton mop pad with stainless steel button can be easily removed. First, put the metal base end of the mop into the mop pad, and the other end into the mop pad as well, press the stainless steel button to complete the installation steps of the mop pad, which is very simple and convenient. The thicker microfibre mop pads can be securely fixed to the mop base with Velcro, so they can be easily attached. Both mop pads are easy to install

Easy to Clean: The flat mop comes with 2 pieces of microfiber mop pad + 1 piece of cotton mop pad for your replacement and long term use. The mop pad can be hand-washed or machine washed, not easy to lose hair and fade, not easy to deformation. It is recommended that you replace the mop pad once every three months
